title.narrative: OUTPUT 2: EARLY RECOVERY WASH PACKAGE

description.narrative: Package of WASH interventions provided to conflict affected persons and IDPs in collective shelters and Schools, which contributes to Hygiene, Sanitation, Wash And Emergencies, Wash In Schools And Ecd Centres, Wash â€“ General, Water, Water Supply. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 7: Conflict affected populations in Syria, especially women and children have adequate, equitable and sustainable access to safe water supply, sanitation and hygiene

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF EDUCATION GIFTS AND DONATION

sector.narrative: HSS - Risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict
Public health emergencies, including disease outbreaks
Sanitation - eliminating open defecation in peri-urban and urban communities
Sanitation - improving services in rural communities (except household water treatment and storage, moving up the ladder and strengthening sustainability)
Sanitation and hygiene - improving services in emergency communities
Sanitation and hygiene - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) including menstrual hygiene management
WASH - risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict
Water supply - safety/quality/treatment (including household treatment and safe storage)
Water supply and sanitation - large systems

Water supply and Sanitation policy, planning and administration
